statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); username=$(whoami); printf '\033[38;2;214;93;14mó°€µ %s\033[0m \033[38;2;215;153;33m%s\033[0m' "$username" "$cwd"; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$branch" ] && printf ' \033[38;2;104;157;106m %s\033[0m' "$branch"; fi; printf ' \033[38;2;60;56;54m %s\033[0m' "$(date +%H:%M)"
